resources.string: This app is craeted as a demostration showing the power of Beacon technology and Augmented Reality. \n\nThis app provides a tested and fully functional navigation in AR inside my departement at University of Ioannina.

1.When the user launches the app, they will be prompted to scan the QR code used to download the app. This is needed to immediately set their position in the virtual world. Using such QR code is the most convenient way to ensure the accuracy of the user position.

2.After the initial position is set, the app starts the ARsesion. Now the app and its minimap will react to user movements seamlessly using visual-inertial odometry provided by ARCore.

3.The user can choose a destination point from a predefined menu or enter it manually. The app searches for a vertex with the given ID and marks it as a destination point.

4.The navigation path from the user current location to the destination point will be calculated in real-time and displayed as a spline with animated arrows.
